text: Inês Etienne Romeu (1942 - April 27, 2015) was a Brazilian political prisoner. She was held in extrajudicial detention in a Brazilian torture camp in the early 1970s. Romeu has been described as the sole captive to survive the camp. Romeu died in Niterói, Brazil at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Brazilian activists Category:Political prisoners Category:People from Minas Gerais
title: Inês Etienne Romeu
